rules_text: {3}{R}{G}: Put target creature card from your hand onto the battlefield, that creature gains haste and “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, conquer that player”. Sacrifice that creature at the end of turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each permanent you control that you don't own. [i](Exile the top card of that players library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and spend mana as though it was any color.)[/i]
